__comment_1: THIS FILE IS OBSOLETE. PLEASE ONLY REMOVE FROM IT, DO NOT ADD TO IT.

messages.noResultsModel: No {model} found, try modifying your search
messages.invalidSignupKey: Sign up key is missing or invalid
messages.alreadyInvited: This email address was already invited
messages.noRegionsForCheck: No applicable regions enabled for this check
messages.requiredRegion: A monitor requires at least one active region
messages.requiredCheck: A monitor requires at least one active check
messages.verificationResent: An email has been sent to your email on file.
messages.errorSignin: The following error occurred while signing in

emailVerify.title: Please verify your email
emailVerify.checkInbox: Please check your inbox to see if you have received a verification email.

register.title: Sign up with Metrist
register.description: Welcome to Metrist! By registering, you can
descriptionOptions: Query service health in real-time, and receive notifications, through our Slack or Teams app
View historical trends and reports on the performance and reliability of your third-party services
Install the Metrist agent for personalized monitoring to compare your experience with that of others

verify.title: Verify your account
verify.checkInbox: Please check your inbox to see if you have received a verification email.

monitors.description: We'll use this information to tailor the Metrist Monitor experience to the services you care about most

regions.title: Choose your default regions
regions.description: Each monitor can perform checks from multiple regions.
regions.descriptionChoose: Select the regions you are most interested in receiving telemetry from and they will be enabled by default on all future monitors you add. Don't worry, you will be able to override these defaults on each monitor individually.
regions.descriptionDisclaimer: The number of regions you choose does not affect performance, only visibility.

complete.title: Completing signup
complete.description: We're setting up your account now. This may take a moment before you'll be redirected to your dashboard once everything is ready.

teams.title: Connect Metrist for Teams
teams.description: Connecting Metrist on Teams is a two step process. You will first need to connect Metrist to Teams by signing in to Azure AD with the same account you use to sign into Teams.
teams.alreadyInstalled: Once Metrist is connected, follow these instructions to install the app in Teams.
teams.connectedTenants: Metrist is connected to the following tenants

callback.title: Confirming Connection
callback.processing: One moment while we finish connecting to your Teams tenant.
callback.failure: We were unable to connect your Teams account to Metrist.

complete.title: Connection Complete
complete.description: Metrist was successfully connected to your Azure AD account.
complete.getStarted: You must follow these instructions to install Metrist to the Teams app.

slack.title: Connect Metrist in Slack
slack.description: Please click below to connect Metrist to your Slack workspace. You may need a workspace administrator to approve the installation. Once approved and installed we'll see you back here.
slack.readOnlyForbidden: You do not have the permissions to connect Slack workspaces to this account.
slack.connectedWorkspaces: Metrist is connected to the following workspaces:
slack.noConnectedWorkspaces: Metrist is currently connected to no workspaces.

callback.title: Confirming Connection
callback.processing: One moment while we finish connecting to your Slack workspace.
callback.failure: We were unable to connect your Slack workspace to Metrist.

complete.title: Connection Complete
complete.description: Metrist was successfully added to your Slack workspace.
complete.getStarted: To get started, open Slack and enter

ctas.title: Install Slack or MS Teams App
ctas.description: Query services in real time and get notifications in your favorite chat app when services have issues.

ctas.title: Install Private Monitoring
ctas.description: Compare Metrist's view of a service's health with your own private or in-process telemetry.

ctas.title: View Historical Trends of a Service
ctas.description: Report on and analyze the historical performance of your services.

ctas.title: Configure Metrist
ctas.description: Configure alarm thresholds, sythentic monitoring regions, notifications, and webhooks.

monitor.title: {name} Monitor
monitor.noSnapshotAlert: No data available for this monitor. If you've recently added it to your account, it may take a few minutes to generate

invites.title: Invite other people
invites.description: You can invite other people to join your account in Metrist. They will have access to the same monitoring and metrics on services that you do.
invites.emailAlreadyInvited: This email address is already active or was already invited
invites.pendingDescription: These are the invitations that have been sent from your account and have not yet been accepted.

invalid.title: Invalid Invite
invalid.description: Sorry that invite is no longer valid.

invite.title: Accept Invite
invite.description: You've been invited to join Metrist! Get started by clicking the button below to sign up
